title.en: Beloved by the Male Lead's Nephew

altTitles.en: The Male Lead's Nephew Loves Me So Much
The Main Male Character's Nephew Really Likes Me

altTitles.id: The Male Lead's Nephew Likes Me So Much
Keponakan male lead suka banget padaku

altTitles.ja: 大公殿下の甥っ子に懐かれてしまいました

altTitles.th: หลานพระเอกสุดแสนจะปลื้มฉัน

altTitles.es-la: El Sobrino Del Protagonista Masculino Me Quiere Mucho

description.en:
One day, my life suddenly come to an end, but I reincarnated as a the villainess of a romantic novel who is obsessed with and stalks the male lead, ultimately getting sentenced to death for trying to kill the female lead. I decided to try to avoid that by leaving the capital and living peacefully in the countryside, however, my dad requested that I come back to the capital because there was a huge mess going: it was reported that the royal heir who was believed to have died 7 years ago is actually alive! The little prince also just so happens to be the nephew of the male lead, who is now looking for him!! I didn’t want to get involved with that but unfortunately on my way to the capital, I rescued a little beggar child who turned out to be the lost royal heir and who is now extremely attached to me. In the original story, the female lead was supposed to find him so she could have the opportunity to meet the male lead, but what will happen to my peaceful life now that the original flow of the story seems to be changing?!!

---
After being reborn as a stalker villainess destined to die for trying to kill Archduke Calix Elluiden's lover, Charlize Lienta fled from the capital to stay away from the archduke at all costs. But her plan goes awry when she returns a year later and rescues a poor boy on the streets... because he turns out to be Sasha, Calix's long-lost nephew! Given her infamous reputation as Calix's stalker, will Charlize succeed in returning Sasha without raising the archduke's suspicions?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/58448925)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%A1%B0%EC%B9%B4%EA%B0%80-%EB%82%98%EB%A5%BC-%EB%84%88%EB%AC%B4-%EC%A2%8B%EC%95%84%ED%95%9C%EB%8B%A4/3548), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62000958)
description.fr: Un jour, je me suis souvenue de ma vie d'avant. Ma deuxième vie est dans un roman et je suis une méchante qui est morte d'obsession pour le protagoniste masculin. À ce rythme, j'allai mourir. J'ai donc déménagé à la campagne et vis maintenant calmement. Mais mon père m'a appelée. La capitale devient folle, on dit que l'empereur Seon a disparu... Le petit garçon que j'ai ramassé en pensant à ma vie antérieure était le neveu du premier rôle masculin! Je ne dérangerai plus jamais Votre Altesse. - Je vous ai envoyé cette lettre. Je suis condamnée. *** Étonnamment, il aurait pu être plus ruiné ici. La sculpture du futur dont j'ai été témoin accidentellement était le début. [ 'Oh, je me demande quel genre de visage aura la princesse Rienta. Le père est mort à sa place pour la sauver.' ] Vous devez établir un contact visuel avec le personnage principal masculin à une distance proche.
description.uk: Одного разу я згадала своє попереднє життя. Моє друге життя - в романі. Я була лиходійкою, яка померла через одержимість головним героєм. Аби не загинути, я переїхала в село й живу собі спокійно, і ось якось зі мною зв'язався батько: «Столиця божеволіє. Кажуть, що ерцгерцог шукає загубленого імператора». Хлопчик, якого я підібрала, був племінником головного героя??? "Я більше ніколи не потурбую Вашу Світлість". - Я власноруч написала це. Я приречена!!!

description.en: An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.

When Tokyo is attacked by evil monsters, who better to save the day than the Super-Ultra-Mega-Level-Anti-Monster-Specialized-human-Final-Boss-Weapon OSAMU!!! 

Golden Future Cup Oneshot #3 2024

altTitles.ja: サクランボッチ

description.en: Sakura, a girl who has difficulty making friends. Kayo, a girl belonging to a literature club of which she is the only member. Yuri, a girl who seems to have a kind of one-sided rivalry with Sakura. Koyuki, a girl with a rather quiet character. These girls with totally different personalities unexpectedly cross paths when all four join their school's literature club!
description.ja: 物事を深く考えすぎるがゆえに友達を作れない桜。そんな桜がある日出会ったのは、部員一人の文芸部部長・花陽。桜を一方的にライバル視するお嬢様・百合や心の声では多弁、現実は無口な後輩・小雪と、個性豊かな残念美少女たちが文芸部に大集結!?

title.en: A Barbarian Was Admitted to the Academy

altTitles.ja: アカデミーにオランケが入学した

altTitles.fr: Un barbare a été admis à l'académie

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Bárbara foi admitida na academia

description.en:
I found myself possessed in a game I used to play occasionally.
And to top it off, I'm the female warrior of a barbarian tribe that only has bad endings.

...Alright, let's escape.

An unlikely relationship blossoms. Do opposites attract? Or will their differences tear them apart? Follow the story of the goth girl Ophelia and the popular footballer Tyler, as they go through their high school life, sitting next to each other in class!
description.pt-br: Uma relação improvável floresce. Será que opostos se atraem? Ou suas diferenças os separarão? Acompanhe a história da garota gótica chamada Ophelia e do popular jogador de futebol americano Tyler, enquanto passam por sua vida escolar, sentados um ao lado do outro na sala de aula!

title.en: Tsurego Shimai Ni Iroiro Hasama Rete Nemurenai

altTitles.ja: 連れ子姉妹にいろいろ挟まれて眠れない

altTitles.en: I Can't Sleep Because Of My Step-Sisters

altTitles.ja: 円環のエモーションズ

description.en: Arakura Arato is a high school student who is always alert to danger and lives a low-key life. One day, his life changes drastically when he is suddenly attacked by a superpower user named Koki Rara. The power of “EMO”—an ability formed from strong emotions.
description.id: Arakura Arato adalah seorang siswa SMA yang selalu waspada terhadap bahaya dan hidup tanpa menonjol. Suatu hari, kehidupannya berubah drastis ketika tiba-tiba dia diserang oleh seorang pengguna kekuatan super bernama Koki Rara. Arato kemudian terseret dalam pertarungan antara para pengguna kekuatan “EMO”—kemampuan yang terbentuk dari emosi yang kuat. Mampukah Arato bertahan dengan kekuatan “barrier” miliknya yang tidak memiliki daya serang…!?
description.ja: 危険を警戒し、目立たず生きる高校生・荒倉アラト。 ある日突然異能力者・好綺羅羅に襲われ、日常は 崩壊する。強い感情が異能力に転化される「ＥＭＯ能力者」どうしの バトルに巻き込まれたアラトは、バリアという攻撃力０の能力で戦い抜く事が出来るのか…!?

title.en: My Sister Is the Main Character

description.en: Reincarnated into a novel, she tries to protect her sister from being imprisoned by taking her place. However, the obsessive duke fixates on her instead, flirting and even threatening to confine her. Strangely, she finds herself drawn to him despite her protests.

title.en: Devil May Cry 5 – Visions of V –

description.en: The spin-off of the latest title, *Devil May Cry 5,* has begun with a bang! The main character is "V," a mysterious man who uses three demons. In addition to the secret of his birth, his encounter with the demons, and the prequel to the main story leading up to the contract, the tale is told from the perspective of V that is exclusive to the spin-off!
description.ru: Спин-офф игры Devil May Cry 5, показывающий историю с точки зрения Ви. В агентстве "Devil May Cry" новый клиент - таинственный Ви. Его заказ "убить могущественного демона, который скоро восстанет" мог бы показаться для Данте обычным делом, если бы не одно но... Этот демон - брат Данте, Вергилий!
description.tr: *Devil May Cry 5*'in mangası olan bu kitap, V karakterini konu alır. Olayları birden V'nin beyni ve gözleri ile görün...

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

altTitles.vi: Destiny Unchain Online: Bị biến thành thiếu nữ ma cà rồng, tôi được biết đến với tên gọi "Xích Sắc Ma Vương"

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!
description.vi: Kou Mitsuki là một game thủ với những kỹ năng phải nói là quá ghê gớm, có biệt danh là "Thợ săn táo Crim". Cậu tham gia thử nghiệm một thiết bị trò chơi mới cho trò chơi mới mà do chính cha của cậu tạo ra, "Destiny Unchained Online". Nhưng trò chơi đầy lỗi khi bắt đầu và phá vỡ giấc mộng trở thành nam ma cà rồng cool ngầu của cậu. Gặp gỡ những đồng minh tuyệt vời và bắt đầu cuộc chơi như vũ bão, câu chuyện về một game thủ hàng đầu nơi mà mọi thứ hay bất kì cái gì đều có thể thay đổi... bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Mitsuki Kou é um jogador PVP tão temido que ganhou o apelido de "Crim, o Caçador de Cabeças" em alguns círculos. Seu próximo jogo para dominar? "Destiny Unchain Online", um novo jogo VRMMO desenvolvido por ninguém menos que o pai de Kou. Mas, nenhum jogo novo no dia do lançamento está livre de bugs - ou seja, Kou sofre um glitch para o meio do nada, e seu avatar de vampiro é transformado em uma garota! Uma história para todos que através dos jogos fizeram novos amigos e miraram no topo... comece!

altTitles.ja: バツイチＪＫ

description.en:
Amane Anzu, a high school student, is actively looking for a boyfriend. However, most candidates tend to quickly lose interest when they find out she's actually a real divorcee. And if that's still not enough to drive guys away, the fact she has a daughter usually does the trick.

Note: each "volume" is much shorter (50-60 pages) than a usual tankoubon.

altTitles.ja: 妻が口をきいてくれません

description.en:
***Winner of the 25th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize for "Short Story!***

A highly discussed and polarizing work that delves into marital issues, sparking major media reactions!

*Why is my wife angry...?*

A husband who thought he was living a peaceful life with his wife, daughter, and son as a typical four-person family suddenly finds himself in an unspoken crisis. One day, his wife stops talking to him. Days turn into weeks, and eventually, this wordless existence stretches into six years. There's no memory of a major fight, and household chores and childcare continue as usual. The only difference? Beyond the bare minimum of necessary communication, his wife doesn't speak to him at all.

Originally serialized to great acclaim on the *Yomitai* website, this much-anticipated book includes the shocking final chapter written exclusively for this release.

altTitles.ja: 娘の寝室

altTitles.vi: Phòng ngủ của con gái tôi

description.en: He had sex with his own daughter-though, of course, only in a dream. Goto, a university lecturer, had seemingly built a happy family: a beautiful wife who is a painter and lovely, talented children... But that happiness was merely a facade. During the day, he suspected his wife of infidelity, and at night, he was tormented by nightmares, gradually wearing down his mental stability. One day, Goto returned home to find his room in chaos and his daughter in tears. Convinced that his wife was to blame, Goto vows to protect his beloved family...!?
description.ja: 実の娘とセックスをした――もちろん夢の中で。大学講師の後藤は幸福な家庭を築いていた。美しい画家の妻、可愛く優秀な子供たち‥‥しかし、その幸福はハリボテだった。昼には妻の不貞を疑い、夜は悪夢に悩まされる日々の中で後藤の精神は擦り切れていく。そんなある日、帰宅した後藤が見たのは荒らされた自室で涙を流す娘の姿。妻の犯行と確信した後藤は大切な家族を自分が守ると決意するが‥‥!?
description.vi: Goto, một giảng viên đại học đang tận hưởng cuộc sống gia đình đầm ấm bên vợ mình là một nữ họa sĩ ăn khách xinh đẹp cùng hai người con. Nhưng rồi khi bắt đầu nảy sinh mối hiềm nghi vợ mình ngoại tình, cộng thêm bản thân đang bị một cơn ác mộng giày vò đã khiến tâm trí anh trở nên ngày càng suy sụp thấy rõ. Bỗng một ngày nọ khi vừa đi làm về, Goto phát hiện phòng ngủ của con gái mình bị ai đó phá tan hoang, và con gái anh đang ngồi khóc trên sàn. Tin rằng những hành động điên rồ này là chỉ có thể là do vợ làm ra, Goto liền quyết định sẽ đứng lên bảo vệ gia đình nhỏ của mình.

altTitles.ja: 入学傭兵

altTitles.th: พี่ชายสายบอดี้การ์ด

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

Ijin est un jeune mercenaire qui est le seul survivant d’un accident d’avion survenu dans son enfance. Il vient tout juste de retourner auprès de sa famille qui le croyait mort durant ses 10 ans d’absence. Ijin pourra-t-il mettre de côté son passé sombre et mener une vie normale de lycéen?

title.en: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita

altTitles.ja: 失恋したのでVtuberはじめたら年上のお姉さんにモテました

altTitles.ja-ro: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita

altTitles.en: I Was Heartbroken, So I Became A VTuber, But Then I Became Popular with the Older Ladies

altTitles.vi: Tuyệt vọng vì thất tình, tôi quyết định trở thành Vtuber vang danh

description.en:
Shocked after Yuki Himemura found out that the club senpai he was crushing on got a boyfriend, he decided to become a VTuber—something both he and his senpai have always liked—and used his savings to assemble his equipment.

He gets his virtual character designed only to discover that it’s a 3D model of a cute girl and, in the process, unintentionally ends up portraying one!

Not only that but the person who designed and rigged his model and his favorite VTubers are starting to take a liking to him…?

(Synopsis via Novel Updates)
description.ja: ずっと想いを寄せていた部活の先輩に彼氏が出来た事を知った姫村優希は、ショックの余り先輩も自分も元々好きだったVtuberに自分がなってしまおうと貯金を叩いて機材を揃えてしまう。そして自分のバーチャル肉体をデザインしてもらったらなんとまさかの美少女3Dモデルで意図せず女の子になりきる事に!?

altTitles.es-la: La Espada de la Inquisición Celestial

description.en:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

In a quirky convenience store known for having everything, a weary cashier faces a daily parade of strange customers.

"Damn it, and it's minimum wage too!", the cashier complains while ringing up a di*do.

title.en: I Became the Tutor of the Royal Twins

description.en:
An elementary school teacher in her past life, and a private tutor in the present.

Sarah Popo uses all her past life experiences in her second life.

She worked as a highly sought out tutor for aristocratic children.

Her goal is to be the owner of her own school!

Then, one day, the Emperor of the Empire sought her out.

“I want Miss Popo to be my siblings’ tutor.”

Water bombs, flour bombs, bug attacks.

What kind of offer did he make? To make her the tutor of a pair of notorious twins with all kinds of vicious pranks!

A very sweet one, of course.

The devil’s temptation shook Sarah’s life.
description.ko:
전생엔 초등교사, 현생엔 가정교사.
인생 2회 차인 세라 포포는 전생의 경험을 살려
귀족 자제들을 대상으로 고액 가정교사 일을 하는 중이었다.
목표는 건물주!

그러던 어느 날,
제국의 황제가 찾아왔다.

“포포 양께서 제 동생들의 가정교사를 맡아주면 좋겠어요.”

물 폭탄, 밀가루 폭탄, 벌레 공격 등
온갖 악질 장난은 다 한다고 악명이 자자한 쌍둥이 전하들의
가정교사가 되어 달라는 무시무시한 제안을 하기 위해!

달콤하기 짝이 없는 고액을 곁들인,
그 악마의 제안이 세라의 인생을 뒤흔들었다.

#환생물 #육아물
#전생도 현생도 교사 여주
#육아지옥에 빠진 황제 남주

description.fr:
C'était la première fois de ma vie.
J'ai passé une nuit avec un homme dont je ne connaissais pas le nom...
C'était un coup d'un soir avec mon futur mari.

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

When playing a virtual reality game called Cang Lan, Xiao Wan gets pushed off a cliff. She ends up in another game world. What will happen to Xiao Wan?

---
**Contents:** 147 (or 410 split releases) [S1] + 227 [S2] => 374 Chapters
- **Season 1:** Chapters 1-147 (1-147)
- **Season 2:** Chapters 1-227+ (148-374+)

**Note:** Chapters 1-114 in Season 1 are in single page format. Starting with chapter 115, the page format switches to long strip.

description.en:
As problems continue to plague the elementary school system, a new solution is enacted in the form of the School Judgment System! Now the young students themselves will be responsible for solving the issues that befall them! But are they up to the task?  
  
**Included one-shots:**  
Volume 3: Gakkyuu Houtei (2 parts)  
  
**Officially published:**  
- In english by VIZ Media as *School Judgment: Gakkyu Hotei*  
- In spanish by [Norma Editorial](https://www.normaeditorial.com/catalogo/S/4411/1/los-juicios-escolares/) as *Los Juicios Escolares*  
- In french by [Kana](https://www.kana.fr/produit/school-judgment/) as *School Judgment*

altTitles.ja: INNU-イッヌ-

description.en:
Violent Action Comedy about a talking stray pug who's waiting for someone to pick him up from the streets. He happens to save a young woman from rape & abduction and the girl agrees to take him in aftwards. As it turns out, she's not a normal girl but a yakuza clan daughter. Luckily, the pug isn't a regular dog either, but a super strong badass fighter.  

(Synopsis by Manga Mogura)
description.vi: Câu chuyện mở đầu với một chú Pug nhỏ bị bỏ rơi bên bờ sông Sumida, Asakura, Tokyo. Thật may mắn thay, em cún đã được một cô nữ sinh tên Sally nhận nuôi và đặt tên là Innu. Nhưng sự thật, em cún Pug này là không những biết nói mà còn là chú chó mạnh nhất. Trước khi được nhận nuôi, Innu đã hứa với cô chủ của mình rằng sẽ sống như một con chó bình thường. Tuy nhiên Sally lại là con gái của một trùm xã hội đen với hàng tá mối nguy hiểm rình rập xung quanh cô. Vậy là cuộc sống mới với đầy những biến động của cô chủ Sally và chú chó Innu chính thức bắt đầu từ đây.

description.en:
Kidnapping, murder, and risqué relationships! Within the scandalous pages of *The Abysmal Flower*, the downfall of Roxana Agrece's criminal family is already foretold. So when Cassis Pedelian, the heroine’s older brother, is kidnapped by Roxana's father, she can either wait for the heroine's revenge... or take matters into her own hands, since Cassis is the key to her survival. But with deceitful characters on all sides, can Roxana and Cassis trust each other enough to bring down the brutal Agreces?

---
I accidentally took possession of someone in a 19+ reverse harem novel.

The problem is that I became Roxanna Agriche, the older sister of the sub-villain. My damn father kidnapped the heroine's brother. Now, is the only thing left to meet a terrible end from the vengeance of the heroine?

But what if I can avoid that horrible development?

“I'm also interested in this toy.”

"I'll protect you until you can get out of here safely."

The heroine's brother, Cassis Pedalian, will definitely be able to pay me back later.

---

**Note:** Please be advised. This work contains somewhat sadistic expressions and portrayals of bloodshed due to the nature of the genre. There are images that may make you feel a little uncomfortable, so please take note. Additionally, this is **not** smut; it's just R15.

**Links:**
- [Official Indonesian/Bahasa Indonesia Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
- [Official Japanese/日本語 Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.fr:
Enlèvements, meurtres, et relations risquées! Dans les pages scandaleuses de *La fleur abyssale*, la chute de la famille criminelle de Roxana Agrece est déjà annoncée. Ainsi, lorsque Cassis Pedelian, le frère aîné de l'héroïne, est kidnappé par le père de Roxana, elle peut soit attendre la vengeance de l'héroïne... soit prendre les choses en main, puisque Cassis est la clé de sa survie. Mais avec des personnages trompeurs de tous les côtés, Roxana et Cassis peuvent-ils se faire suffisamment confiance pour faire tomber les brutales Agrece?

---
Traductions officielles:
* [Anglais / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Indonésien / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Japonais / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.id:
Aku tidak sengaja merasuki seseorang dalam novel harem terbalik 19+.  Masalahnya adalah aku menjadi Roxana Agriche, kakak dari sub-penjahat itu. Ayahku menculik saudara pemeran utama wanita itu. Sekarang, apakah satu-satunya hal yang tersisa untuk menemui akhir yang mengerikan dari pembalasan pemeran utama wanita? Tetapi bagaimana jika aku dapat menghindari perkembangan yang mengerikan itu?  “Aku juga tertarik dengan mainan ini.”  "Aku akan melindungimu sampai kamu bisa keluar dari sini dengan selamat."

---
Official Translations:
* [Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Bahasa Inggris / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Bahasa Jepang / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.it:
Accidentalmente mi sono reincarnata in un personaggio in un romanzo di harem inverso per maggiorenni. Il problema è che sono diventata Roxana Agriche, la sorella maggiore del cattivo. Il mio dannato padre ha poi rapito il fratello dell'eroina. Ora cosa ci rimane per incontrare una fine terribile e la vendetta dell'eroina? Ma cosa dovrei fare per evitare quest'orribile sviluppo? "Anche io sono interessata a questo giocattolo." "Ti proteggerò, finché non potrai uscire di qui sano e salvo." Il fratello dell'eroina, Cassis Fedelian, potrà sicuramente ripagarmi più tardi.

---
Official Translations:
* [Giapponese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)

* [Inglese / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
description.ja:
どういう訳か小説の中の悪の一族、アグリチェ一家の娘「ロクサナ」に生まれ変わっていた！ アグリチェは人殺しをものともしない残虐非道な一族で、ロクサナもまたその一族の一人。 そして物語は、ロクサナの父「ラント」がある男を拉致してきた場面から始まる。 その拉致されてきた男は、アグリチェ一族とは対極のぺデリアン一族のプリンス「カシス」だった。 アグリチェ一族の誰もがカシスを殺そうとする中、ロクサナだけは唯一家族を騙してでも必死に救おうとする。 最初はロクサナを警戒していたカシスも徐々に心を開き始め…。

---

* [英語 / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [インドネシア語 / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
description.ko:
어쩌다 보니 19금 역하렘 소설에 빙의했다.

문제는 내가 악역 서브남의 누나가 되었다는 건데... 망할 아버지가 기어이 여자 주인공의 오빠를 납치해 왔다. 이제 여주인공의 가문에 복수 당해 몰락할 일만 남은 건가. 아아, 데드 플래그 피하기 진짜 힘들다.

"이번 장난감에는 저도 흥미가 있어요."

오빠, 이렇게 된 이상 내가 지켜줄게요.

그러니까 이 은혜는 나중에 꼭 갚아요, 알았죠?

---
Official Translations:
* [영어 / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [인도네시아어 / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [일본어 / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.ru:
Я переродилась в новелле 19+ с реверс-гаремом.

Проблема в том, что я стала старшей сестрой второго, злого главного героя… Мой чертов отец в конце концов похитил старшего брата главной героини. Теперь осталось только дожидаться мести от главной героини и разрушения рода? Ах, избежать смертельной концовки и правда тяжело.

"Я тоже заинтересована в этой игрушке."

Раз уж так вышло, то я тебя защищу. Поэтому обязательно отплати мне той же монетой, понял?

---

description.tr:
Bir 19+ ters harem romanının içine girdim.

Sorun şu ki, kötü adamın ablası Roxana Agriche oldum. Lanet babam, kahramanın kardeşini kaçırdı. Şimdi, kahramanın intikamından dolayı korkunç bir sonla karşılaşmak geriye kalan tek şey mi?

Ama ya bu korkunç gelişmeden kaçınırsam?

“Buradan sağ salim çıkana kadar seni koruyacağım.”

Kahramanın kardeşi Cassis Pedalian kesinlikle onun için yaptıklarımı daha sonra geri ödeyecek.

---

description.pt-br:
Eu acidentalmente possui alguém em uma novel de harém reverso +19.
O problema é que eu me tornei Roxana Agriche, a irmã mais nova do sub-vilão. Meu maldito pai sequestrou o irmão da heroína.
Agora, a única coisa que me resta é encontrar um final terrível da vingança da heroína?
Mas e se eu puder evitar esse acontecimento?
“Eu também estou interessada nesse brinquedo.”
“Eu vou protegê-lo até que possa sair daqui a salvo.”
O irmão da heroína, Cassis Pedalian, vai definitivamente conseguir me retribuir depois.

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

description.en: While building a huge tower to touch the heavens, Tenshi is surprised by a divine entity taking possession of Okuu's body and is knocked out of the sky once again. Now, she will have to join forces with the now-god Sanae Kochiya to stop this new enemy.

altTitles.ja: 『行方不明。』

description.en: Kanade is an honest working janitor and Ryo is a gigolo living a self-indulgent lifestyle. The two are childhood friends and share a secret they can’t tell anyone. They have a dependent relationship where they’ll dirty their hands for the other, but what happens when they both end up as murderers…?

altTitles.ja: 夢なし先生の進路指導

description.en: A former career consultant, Takanashi now works for a school as a Guidance Counselor. During career guidance meetings, he gives headstrong students data and tells them the realities of the world around them, hoping that they rethink their dreams. Because of that, students call him "Yumenashi-sensei" ("Dreamless-sensei"/"Dream Crusher–sensei").
description.ja: 元キャリアコンサルタントの高校教師・高梨（たかなし）は、生徒から「夢なし先生」と呼ばれている。彼は進路指導時、生徒の「夢」に対し現実的なデータや世の中の実情を突きつけ、否定し、覚悟を問う。それでも夢を追い、のちに夢破れ、どん底の中でも諦めきれない生徒がいれば、卒業後でも手を差し伸べ、「諦めるための授業」を行うのだった。

altTitles.ja: BLEACH カラー版
ブリーチ
ブリーチ カラー版

description.en:
Ichigo Kurosaki has always been able to see ghosts, but this ability doesn't change his life nearly as much as his close encounter with Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society. While fighting a Hollow, an evil spirit that preys on humans who display psychic energy, Rukia attempts to lend Ichigo some of her powers so that he can save his family, but much to her surprise, Ichigo absorbs every last drop of her energy. Now a full-fledged Soul Reaper himself, Ichigo quickly learns that the world he inhabits is one full of dangerous spirits, and along with Rukia, who is slowly regaining her powers, it's Ichigo's job to both protect the innocent from Hollows and to help the spirits themselves find peace.   
  
Monochrome version won the 50th Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
description.es:
Ichigo Kurosaki siempre ha sido capaz de ver fantasmas, pero esta habilidad no cambia su vida tanto como su encuentro cercano con Rukia Kuchiki, una Segadora de Almas y miembro de la misteriosa Sociedad de las Almas. Mientras lucha contra un hueco, un espíritu maligno que se aprovecha de los humanos que muestran energía psíquica, Rukia intenta prestarle a Ichigo algunos de sus poderes para que pueda salvar a su familia, pero para su sorpresa, Ichigo absorbe hasta la última gota de su energía. Ahora que ya es un auténtico Segador de Almas, Ichigo aprende rápidamente que el mundo que habita está lleno de peligrosos espíritus y, junto con Rukia, que está recuperando lentamente sus poderes, el trabajo de Ichigo consiste en proteger a los inocentes de los huecos y ayudar a los propios espíritus a encontrar la paz.  
  
Versión monocroma ganó el 50º Premio Shogakukan Manga en la categoría Shounen.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do mangá Bleach. A história gira em torno de Kurosaki Ichigo um estudante de 15 anos que tem uma estranha capacidade de ver, tocar e falar com espíritos de pessoas mortas. Logo que o Shinigami (Deus da Morte) Kuchiki Rukia toma conhecimento dos poderes dele ela decide investigá-lo, e acaba em uma luta com um Hollow que foi atraído pelo forte poder espiritual de Ichigo, antes de ser derrotada pela criatura, Rukia passa seus poderes a Ichigo, o qual se torna um Shinigami, e após derrotar o Hollow ingressa em uma jornada para proteger os humanos e os espíritos da ameaça dos Hollows.

description.en:
"I'm going to live a normal life!"

Cho-eun, the heir to the underworld organization, Red Arrow Group, has finally entered university. She just wants to make lots of friends, but finds herself surrounded by four suspicious men.

"Are you an enemy? Or a friend? Or... do you like me?"

With a whirlwind of emotions—joy, anger, sorrow, and pleasure—engulfing her twenties as a freshman, will Cho-eun's dream of a normal campus life come true?

---

description.en:
Shirosaki Reito was suddenly sucked in by a mysterious crack and got transferred in between dimensions. He got reincarnated as a baby in another world. He was born in the royal family and was the heir to the throne but he was driven/kicked of the palace. The reason was that he was born as a Support magician and had Alchemist as a job which was the lowest job that existed in the new world and people who had that were considered jobless. But there was a secret hidden in that job!!   
From jobless to the strongest job!!!  



---

  
Bookwalker LN:  
<https://bookwalker.jp/series/182424/>  
Official LN:  
<https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/312278148/185185579>
description.fr:
Shirosaki Reito a été soudainement aspiré par une mystérieuse fissure et a été transféré entre deux dimensions.  
Il s'est réincarné en bébé dans un autre monde.  
Né dans la famille royale et étant l'héritier du trône, il est cependant chassé du palais.  
La raison ?  
être né en tant que magicien de soutien et avoir une profession d'alchimiste !  
Considérée comme la profession la plus faible, Reito fera tout pour s'endurcir et devenir fort !
description.ru: Широсаки Рейто неожиданно засосало в загадочную расщелину и переместило в измерение между мирами, после чего он переродился младенцем в ином мире. Он появился на свет в королевской семье, оказавшись наследником трона, но всё равно в итоге его выгнали из дворца. Причиной этому послужило то, что он оказался магом поддержки и заполучил профессию алхимика, оказавшуюся слабейшей в этом новом мире. Таких как он в этом фантастическом мире магии считают не имеющими профессии, но, как оказалось, существует некий секрет!! Проследим же путь становления сильнейшим в мире героя со слабейшей профессией!

altTitles.ja: グラップラー刃牙完全版

description.en:
"If someone is born a male, at least once in his life he'll dream of becoming the strongest man alive. Grappler, the martial artist who aims to become the strongest in the world!"

That is the dream held by the Grappler, Baki Hanma.

The mysterious, young, martial artist aspires to follow in his sinister father's footsteps as the world's strongest creature. But to what lengths will Baki go?

We follow the young grappler as he matures in a world full of extremely powerful fighters and how he overcomes all obstacles in order to face his father one day in the fighting ring.

When he arrives at an underground martial arts tournament, Baki is put to the test from fighters all over the world. Will he overcome all odds and become the champion of the underground arena?!

Newly Re-edited, this edition of Grappler Baki features new cover art and color pages.

マケイン

altTitles.th: รักครั้งนี้มีคนนกเยอะไปมั้ย?!

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
___
**Character Designer:** [Imigimuru](https://mangadex.org/author/341a08ca-acbf-49a3-998a-d3451249ec43)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Alternative Official Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
- [Official Raw Light Novel](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]
description.pt-br: O simples, chato e sem amigos Nukumizu Kazuhiko testemunhou algo completamente desconcertante: a garota popular Yanami Anna foi colocada na friend zone por seu crush e amigo de infância! Na verdade, todas as garotas populares ao redor dele estão sendo rejeitadas da mesma forma pelos garotos de quem gostam. Sem perceber, Kazuhiko se envolve no drama do relacionamento onde todas as heroínas principais estão perdendo o amor! Ele pode manter o ânimo delas e ajudá-las a encontrar a felicidade?

altTitles.ja: 後藤さんは振り向かせたい

altTitles.en: Gotou-san Wants Me to Turn Around

altTitles.fr: Gotou-san veut que je me retourne

altTitles.es: Gotou-san Quiere Que me Dé la Vuelta.

description.en: Gotou-san, the prettiest girl in school, tries to get the attention of Maeda-kun, who sits in front of her. She secretly harbors a crush on him, but Maeda, who lacks self-confidence, doesn't notice her feelings. What is the future of Gotou-san's unwavering love?
description.es: La chica más guapa de la escuela, Gotou-san, siempre está tonteando con Maeda-kun, el chico sentado frente a ella. Ella está secretamente enamorada de él, pero Maeda-kun, que es inseguro de sí mismo, no entiende sus intenciones.
description.fr: Gotou-san, la plus jolie fille de l'école, demande quelque chose à Maeda-kun devant lui. Gotou-san l'aime secrètement, mais Maeda, qui ne lui fait pas confiance, ne la remarque pas.Quel est l'avenir de l'amour indéfectible de Gotou-san ?
description.ja:
その恋心に気付いてほしい！

学校一の美少女・後藤さんは前の席の前田くんになにかとちょっかいをかけてくる。そこには後藤さんの秘めたる恋心があるのだが、自分に自信のない前田君にはその意図は全く伝わらない。果たして後藤さんの一途な恋の行く末は？

altTitles.vi: Drawing: Mangaka Mạnh Nhất Với Kỹ Năng Vẽ Tranh Vô Song Tại Dị Giới

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daiyonshou - Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majou

altTitles.es: Re:Zero - Empezar de cero en un mundo diferente - Arco 4: El santuario y la bruja de la avaricia

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 4: The Sanctuary and the Witch of Greed

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活 第四章 聖域と強欲の魔女

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть четвёртая: Святилище и ведьма жадности

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero - Capítulo 4: O Santuário e a Bruxa da Ganância

description.en: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
description.es:
Decididos a liberar a Rem de un misterioso letargo, Subaru y Emilia emprenden un nuevo viaje hacia el Santuario en donde se enfrentarán a nuevos peligros que jamás imaginarían.

¡La esperada adaptación del arco 4 comienza aquí!
description.ru: После победы над белым китом и архиепископом греха лени Петельгейзе, Субару наконец воссоединяется с Эмилией. Однако они узнают шокирующие новости, что на Круш с Рем по пути в столицу снова напал культ ведьмы. Круш потеряла свою память, а все воспоминания о Рем у людей были стёрты. Вместе с жителями деревни Субару решает вернуться обратно, однако деревня оказалась пустой. Оставшиеся жители, которые под руководством Рам отправились в так называемое "Святилище", до сих пор не вернулись. Что же там произошло?..

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.th: ก๊วนป่วนชวนบุ๋งบุ๋ง

altTitles.ja: ぐらんぶる

description.en:
A new life begins for Kitahara Iori as he begins his college career near the ocean in Izu city, full of excitement for his new life. 
He will be moving into his uncle's diving store "Grand Blue." There he finds the ocean, beautiful women, and men that love diving and alcohol. 
Will Iori be able to live his dream college life?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10058/episode/318585) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/306-grand-blue-dreaming)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ «کیتاهارا ایوری» پسری است که برای شروع دوره دانشجویی خود به شهر دریایی «ایزو» می رود؛ او که از روبرو شدن با زندگی جدید خود اشتیاق فراوانی دارد به این فکر است که در فروشگاه لوازم غواصی عموی خود که به نام Grand Blue (گرند بلو) شناخته می شود مشغول به کار شود. آنجا او دریایی پر از دلخوشی را می یابد، دخترانی زیبا را به چشم می بیند و همچنین مردانی که عاشق غواصی هستند و وقت خودشان را به نوشیدن انواع نوشیدنی ها می گذرانند ملاقات می کند. حال باید دید که ایوری می تواند زندگی دانشجویی دلخواهش را در این شهر دنبال کند یا خیر؟!
description.ja: 海沿いの街で一人暮らしを始めた北原伊織は衝撃の大学デビューを果たす。出会ったのは美女とダイビング、そして愛すべき野郎ども！
description.ru: Новая жизнь Китахары Ёри начинается с момента поступления в колледж, который находится на берегу океана в городе Идзу. В предвкушении новых эмоций парень отправляется в дазин своего дяди «Необъятный океан». Здесь его ждет красивый океан, прекрасные женщины и мужчины, что любят дайвинг и алкоголь. Сможет ли Ёри прожить студенческую жизнь своей мечты?
description.pt-br: Uma nova vida começa para Kitahara Iori, que entrou na faculdade perto do mar, na cidade de Izu. Emocionado por um novo começo, ele se muda para casa do seu tio, uma loja de mergulho chamada "Grand Blue". Lá, ele encontra um lindo oceano, belas mulheres, e os homens que gostam de mergulho e álcool... Será que Iori vai ser capaz de viver sua tão sonhada vida universitária? Do mesmo autor de Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu, uma nova comédia começa!

title.en: The Girl with the Sanpaku Eyes

altTitles.ja: 三白眼ちゃんは伝えたい

altTitles.en: The Feelings of a Girl with Sanpaku Eyes

altTitles.vi: Cô Nàng Mắt Tam Bạch Muốn Bày Tỏ

description.en:
This is a retelling of how Amane and Katou met, from The Story of a Girl with Sanpaku Eyes.  
  
Trivia: Sanpaku (三白) is a Japanese term meaning "three whites". It is generally referred to in English as "sanpaku eyes" and refers to eyes in which the white space above or below the iris is visible.
description.vi: Xin giới thiệu Mizuno Amane, một cô nàng với cặp mắt tam bạch (sanpuku) dữ tợn và trái tim thiếu nữ dịu dàng! Amane đã phải lòng anh chàng bàn bên Katou mất rồi! Rồi bây giờ sẽ phải làm sao để bày tỏ nỗi lòng với chàng trai ấy đây?!

title.en: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun (Mafia Alternate Universe)

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん if Episode of 魔フィア

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia

altTitles.vi: Iruma Giá Đáo!: IF Episode of MAFIA

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun: IruMafia Edition

altTitles.ko: 악마에 입문했습니다! if Episode of 魔fia

description.en: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?
description.ja: 暴力や犯罪は当たり前の貧民街-スラム-で育った心優しい少年・イルマ。瀕死状態で倒れていた、マフィア組織【バビル】のドン・サリバンを助けたことで、イルマの運命の歯車が動き出す！ マフィア組織【バビル】を中心に巻き起こる、マフィア・アクションコメディ！
description.vi: Spin-Off của tác phẩm"Mairimashita! Iruma-kun" theo hướng What-If, thế giới của tác phẩm lần này sẽ xoay quanh việc các nhân vật sẽ sống trong thế giới của các Mafia
description.es-la: ¡Un spin-off oficial de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun, en un universo alternativo en el que Iruma se convierte en un destacado miembro de la mafia. A pesar de tener sólo cinco años, Iruma ha visto muchas cosas como niño de la calle... ¡la más reciente, a un anciano desangrándose justo delante de donde vive! Como buen chico, Iruma se dedica a curar al anciano y no le da importancia. Sin embargo, cuando el anciano regresa de repente, se revela como Don Sullivan, ¡jefe de la organización clandestina conocida como Babyls! Se ofrece a adoptar a Iruma como su nieto, una oferta que Iruma se ve incapaz de rechazar...
description.pt-br: Os amados personagens de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun estrela neste spinoff baseado na máfia! O jovem Iruma salva um chefe da máfia ferido da morte... e então se torna seu neto!?

altTitles.en: Yuri Between a Crybaby and a Girl Named Kokoa

title.en: Warui ga Watashi wa Yuri ja nai

altTitles.ja: 悪いが私は百合じゃない

altTitles.en: Sorry, but I’m Not into Yuri

altTitles.zh: 虽然很抱歉但我不是百合

altTitles.zh-hk: 雖然很抱歉但我不是百合

altTitles.zh-ro: Suīrán hěn bàoqiàn dàn wǒ bùshì bǎihé

description.en: In an attempt to win her homeroom teacher's heart, Itsumi Toudou purchased a shady love potion, and tested it out on her stuck-up student committee president, Yomotsuka. Now, she has an uncharacteristically affectionate girl to deal with, and she's not even a lesbian! Right?
description.es: Em uma tentativa de ganhar o coração de seu professor de sala de aula, Itsumi Toudou comprou uma poção do amor sombria e a testou em sua presunçosa presidente do comitê estudantil, Yomotsuka. Agora, ela tem uma garota estranhamente afetuosa para lidar, e ela nem é lésbica! Certo?
description.ja: 担任の男性教師に恋をしている藤堂いつみは、ある日いけないサイトで惚れ薬を入手し、担任に飲ませようとする。しかし、真面目で堅苦しい美人学級委員長やヤンキー女子に飲まれてしまったから、さあ大変！
description.pt-br: Numa tentativa de conquistar o coração de seu professor, Itsumi Toudou comprou uma poção do amor suspeita e a testou em Yomotsuka, a presidente do conselho estudantil. Agora, ela tem de lidar com uma menina estranhamente afetuosa, e aquela nem sequer é lésbica! Ou será que não?

title.en: Not Much Else to Do for Fun in the Countryside

altTitles.ja: 田舎なんて、こんなことしか楽しみがないから

altTitles.ja: バビル２世　ザ・リターナー

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

After 40 years, "Babel II" is miraculously back!

This time, the enemy is the world's most powerful military nation, the United States of America! 

A supernatural battle of modern warfare vs. Babel II breaks out...!

altTitles.ja: 恋色の境界 (東方)

description.en: A Touhou Project Doujinshi Series

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

altTitles.ja: ペルソナ5

description.en: The story focuses on the 16-year-old protagonist, Akira Kurusu, who got transferred to Shujin High School in Tokyo after he was sued by a man with political connection for a non-existent violence when Akira saved a woman from being molested by the man, leading to his probation. Arriving in Tokyo, he finds a mysterious app got installed into his phone that enables him to enter another world formed from corrupt hearts of adults where he awakens his power called Persona. During his times there, he is joined by two fellow students Ryuuji Sakamoto and Ann Takamaki, and a shape-shifting cat-like creature known as Morgana. Feeling suppressed by their environment, the four form a group known as the "Phantom Thieves of Heart" to steal corrupt hearts of adults and reform society.

altTitles.ja: 転生前はドラゴンでした

altTitles.en: Before Reincarnation I Was A Dragon

description.en: The hero and the dragon defeated the Demon King, saving the world, but they died. Then they were reincarnated in another world (Japan)... This is their story.
